project.title: DemonTHON
project.description_short: DemonTHON is a year-long fundraising organization benefiting Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children's Hospital of Chicago that culminates in a 24-hour Dance Marathon at DePaul University.
description_long: DemonTHON is a year-long fundraising organization benefiting Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children's Hospital of Chicago that culminates in a 24-hour Dance Marathon at DePaul University.

As the Director of Technology, Adam designed and managed the organization's website from June 2014 to May 2016. The site was awarded "Best Website" by Children's Miracle Network Hospitals for the 2014-15 Dance Marathon year.
